adjectives.description: ambrosial (comparative more ambrosial, superlative most ambrosial)

entries.meaning: (Greek mythology) Pertaining to or worthy of the gods.
Succulently sweet or fragrant; balmy, divine.
examples: By your cheek of vermil hue, / By your lip’s ambrosial dew, / By your soft and languid eye, / By your swelling bosom’s sigh, / You taught me love.
